sentences.sentence: Degreasing efficiency levels up to 94% in the optimum conditions.
sentences.translation: 在最佳试验条件下，脱脂率可达94 %以上。

sentences.sentence: Surface processing: degreasing, acid washing, phosphating, Static, powder coating.
sentences.translation: 表面处理：脱脂，酸洗，磷化，静电，喷塑。

sentences.sentence: A truly amazing heavy duty degreaser that delivers powerful cleaning and degreasing action Fast!
sentences.translation: 一个真正了不起的重型脱脂，提供强大的清洁和脱脂行动快！
